roleset.name: to compose or draw up a plan for

example.name: transitive
example.text: While [*-1] flying home from those discussions , Mr. Bush drafted a letter to Mr. Gorbachev suggesting an informal get-together [0] [*T*-2] to precede their formal summit next year .
example.arg: While [*-1] flying home from those discussions
a letter to Mr. Gorbachev suggesting an informal get-together [0] [*T*-2] to precede their formal summit next year

example.name: passive
example.text: Now comes word that [IRS regulations]-1 being drafted [*]-1 could put companies in violation of the tax code if they make loans to retiree shareholders and directors but do n't make them available to other former workers who [*T*-1] usually earned less .

example.name: all arguments
example.text: `` There was a lot of internal debate about that specific issue , '' said [*T*-1] Susan Bryant , Oklahoma 's chief securities regulator and president of the North American Securities Administrators Association , which [*T*-3] drafted a voluntary settlement plan for the states with Drexel .
example.arg: which -> the North American Securities Administrators Association

predicate.note: Frames file for 'draft' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: select from a group for some job/service

role.descr: job or service to be performed

example.name: all args
example.text: We sort of drafted him from his clerkship with a district judge to fill in for an attorney called into active duty in Afghanistan.
example.arg: from his clerkship with a district judge
to fill in for an attorney called into active duty in Afghanistan

example.name: passive arg1
example.text: [None of them]-1 are being drafted *-1 and sent to Vietnam . None is a freedom rider .
